C L I P P E R   P O S I T I O N S
---------------------------------------
FEAST/NOPAC/SEASIA/AUSSIE
M/V CLIPPER AEGINA 32,691 DWT     PASIR GUDANG 27 MAY (ANN)
M/V CLIPPER KENT 34,003 DWT    TAGONOURA  4 JUN (MADS)
M/V SAGAR KANYA 58,609 DWT    CJK 1 JUN (MORTEN)
VESSEL DESCRIPTIONS
CLIPPER AEGINA - MARSHALL ISLAND/2010 (GEARLESS)
SEMI BOXSHAPED/LOG-FITTED/BULKCARRIER/CO2 FITTED/A60 BULKHEAD (GEARLESS)
ABT. 32,691 MT DEADWEIGHT ON 10.15 M SSW
L.O.A./BEAM 179.90/28.40 METERS
5 HOLDS/HATCHES
GRAIN/BALE 43,125/40,755 CBM
ABT 11.00 (L)/12.00 (B) KNOTS ON ABT 14.00/13.00 MT LSIFO 380CST + 0.10 MT MGO PER DAYO
CLIPPER KENT - HONG KONG/2012
34,003 DWT ON 9.816 MTRS SSW
GRAIN/BALE 47,042.2 / 44,435.2 CBM
5/5 HO/HA - 4 X 30 MT CRANES
LADEN 13.9 KN ON ABT 27.9 MT VLSIFO (380 CST)
BALLAST 14.00 KN ON ABT 23.9 MT VLSIFO (380 CST)
4.8/3.0 MT IN THE PORT, +0.1 MT MGO
SAGAR KANYA - PANAMA/2013
58,609 DWT ON 12,676M SSW
LOA 197M/BM 32.26M
GRAIN CAP 73,679 CBM
5/5 HOLDS/HATCHES 4X30MT GEAR+4X12CBM GRABS
LADEN 13 (11.5) KNOTS ON 27.5 (21) MT (ECO)
BALLAST 13.5 (12.5) KNOTS ON 27 (21) MT (ECO)
PORT 4.0/2.3 W/I +0,1MT LSMGO
